ing: 1 (15.5 ounce) can sliced peaches in heavy syrup
n: Bob's Habanero Hot Sauce - Liquid Fire
des: "Using fewer habanero peppers can reduce the spiciness in this extremely hot habanero hot sauce.  The sauce works wonders as a pick-up for Bloody Mary drinks.  Flavors meld wonderfully and the sauce keeps nicely for a long time.  Warning: A dash is all you need and it is best to use gloves when handling the habanera peppers."
ins: Place the peppers, peaches, molasses, mustard, brown sugar, and vinegar into the container of a food processor or blender. Measure in the salt, paprika, pepper, cumin, coriander, ginger and allspice. Blend until liquefied. Pour into clean jars, and refrigerate overnight before using.
